querystring.select: SELECT RO.OFFICE_NAME AS OfficeName, UMH.UPLOAD_MONITORING_NO AS UploadNo, UMH.FILE_NAME AS FileName, UMH.UPLOAD_DT AS UploadDt, UMH.TOTAL_RECORD AS TotalRecord, UMH.TOTAL_RECORD_PROCESSED AS TotalRecordProcessed
querystring.from: FROM dbo.V_UPLOAD_MONITORING_H UMH WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN dbo.UPLOAD_LEAD AS UL WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON UMH.UPLOAD_MONITORING_NO = UL.UPLOAD_MONITORING_NO LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_OFFICE AS RO WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON UL.ORI_OFFICE_CODE = RO.OFFICE_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS AS RS WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON UL.UPLOAD_STATUS = RS.REF_STATUS_CODE AND RS.STATUS_GRP_CODE = N'UPLOAD_STATUS'
querystring.groupby: GROUP BY RO.OFFICE_NAME, UMH.UPLOAD_MONITORING_NO, UMH.FILE_NAME, UMH.UPLOAD_DT, UMH.TOTAL_RECORD, UMH.TOTAL_RECORD_PROCESSED
